statements: SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, is_admin FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE is_admin = FALSE
SELECT * FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND is_admin = FALSE ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE access_level >= 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_control GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE users.user_id > 3 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, date_created FROM users ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name='admin';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT role_id, permission_name FROM role_permissions JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY date_created DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_permissions FROM user_roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id GROUP BY user_id

SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM user_roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(rp.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY num_permissions DESC;
